name: land-registry-elements-examples
description: [land-registry-elements](https://github.com/LandRegistry/land-registry-elements) provides a set of reusable components based on and extending the gov uk elements. This repository contains the bare minimum required to build these assets using [land-registry-gulp-tasks](https://github.com/LandRegistry/land-registry-gulp-tasks)

scripts.build: gulp clean && gulp copy && gulp build
